refund-policy.title: Tickets refund policy
refund-policy.service-fee: The return of tickets purchased on the qiosk.am website is carried out with a service fee.
refund-policy.7-days-more: If you return a ticket more than 7 days before the start of the event, the service fee is 10% of the price.
refund-policy.7-days-less: When returning a ticket less than 7, but more than 3 days before the start of the event, the service fee is 20%.
refund-policy.72-hours: Events that start after 72 hours or less are non-refundable.
refund-policy.cancel: If the event is canceled or rescheduled by the organizers, tickets will be refunded without service charge.
refund-policy.term: Refunds are made by the bank within up to 7 working days and we cannot influence the term for crediting money.

events.not-found: Events on request were not found.
